text: @SpeakerPelosi Tell Pence off camera Covid-19 briefings are shady. Donald is saying the opposite of the scientists and he always gets his way. Pence doesn’t have a great record with the HIV outbreak, and won’t say anything to offend trump in his interviews. We don’t even know # of US infected
